nodes.bodyText: consistency: other functions start with keyword function
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -107,7 +107,7 @@ checkJavaHome()
 {
     # validate JAVA_HOME
     if [[ ! -x ${JAVA_HOME}/bin/java ]]; then
-        fail "\$JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME is invalid. Set \$JAVA_HOME in ~/.bashrc or $default_env_script on all Greenplum hosts."
+        fail "\$JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME is invalid. Set \$JAVA_HOME in your environment before initializing PXF."

nodes.bodyText: in the overall flow we call checkJavaHome (line 371) before calling this function, so we are guaranteed it is set to correct path and probably there's no need to check here again ?
